law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 13, effective July 14, 2000. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. III, sec. 110, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cumulative increase for 1982-83 only -- Limit -- Public hearing and recall not applicable.
